defword macro
defconst macro
defvar macro
Literal value
e.g : LITN 80*25 ; for i = 0 to 80*25 LITN 0 ; do LITN ‘ ‘ ; emit ‘ ‘ dd EMIT ; loop
NEXT macro
PUSHRSP and POPRSP push and pop in the return stack
e.g : begin dd DUP, FETCHBYTE, DUP while dd EMIT, INCR repeat
